abstract: Research in Motion, maker of the BlackBerry, had said Nortel’s wireless unit should be kept in Canadian hands. The country’s industry minister disagreed.
snippet: Research in Motion, maker of the BlackBerry, had said Nortel’s wireless unit should be kept in Canadian hands. The country’s industry minister disagreed.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA  Tony Clement, the industry minister for Canada, said on Wednesday that his department would not review the takeover of the wireless assets of bankrupt Nortel Networks by Ericsson of Sweden.

headline.main: Canada Won’t Review Sale of Nortel Unit
headline.print_headline: Canada Won’t Review Sale of Nortel Unit
